dcterms:description: The CNN/DailyMail dataset is commonly used for training and evaluating summarization models, providing a collection of news articles and their corresponding summaries.

dcterms:description: XSum is a dataset designed for extreme summarization, where each input article is paired with a single-sentence summary.
